fact-1.value: Mondi’s purpose is to contribute to a better world by making innovative, sustainable packaging and paper solutions. This better world is one in which everyday products are designed to minimise waste and maximise resource efficiency as part of a truly circular economy, supported by responsible and sustainable business practices. In our efforts to achieve this, we build on our position as a leading partner for ambitious customers, talented employees, responsible suppliers and industry associations that support  cross-sector innovation

fact-4.value: Ground Floor, Building 5,  The Heights, Brooklands,  Weybridge, Surrey, KT13 0NY,  United Kingdom
